text: Mishki versus Yudenich () is a 1925 Soviet silent comedy movie directed by Grigori Kozintsev and Leonid Trauberg.«Лев Толстой» Сергея Герасимова — на большом экране в МосквеМИШКИ ПРОТИВ ЮДЕНИЧА It stars Alexander Zavyalov, Polina Pona, and Sergei Gerasimov. ==Actors== * Alexander Zavyalov as Mishka, paperboy * Polina Pona as white spy * Sergei Gerasimov * Andrei Kostrichkin * Yevgeny Kumeyko as General Yudenich * Emil Gal as photographer == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Soviet silent movies Category:1925 comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Grigori Kozintsev Category:Movies directed by Leonid Trauberg
title: Mishki versus Yudenich
